I'd like to be able to purchase ebooks for my students without having to sell a kidney to fund it first.
Can't fit in every author - if you still want students to know about them then we have to be able to offer backlist and duplicates in digi.
Feeling so frustrated at publisher limitations on ebooks for school libraries. Smaller shelf areas in modern libraries = less physical books
